p: Forest ecosystem C dynamics in this study were estimated using the Carbon Budget Model of the Canadian Forest Sector (CBM-CFS3) [ 21, 22]. Carbon transferred from forest ecosystems to HWP and bioenergy were tracked through manufacturing, use/export, and end-of-life use by the Carbon Budget Modeling Framework for Harvested Wood Products (CBM-FHWP) [ 5, 18]. More details about the models are described in Additional file 1: Additional materials.
